mapper.insert: insert into bcc_member (id, pw, name, email, tel, zip, address1, address2) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zip}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.select: select * from bcc_member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.delete: delete from bcc_member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
